benefit1Body.message: Charts and CSV to show your boss, team, or your own conscience.

block_page_body.message: You marked this site as procrastination. Close the tab or adjust the list if you change your mind.

codeconBulletChallenge.message: Challenge: prove remote work in 4 hours of hand-crafted code, no AI allowed.

codeconBulletNarrative.message: ‚ÄúAttorney‚Äù narrative turns metrics into a defense for the manager/jury.

codeconBulletTracking.message: Extension watches tab switches, idle time, and villain sites to build an index.

codeconLead.message: The idea was born at a CodeCon hack lab: Ot√°vio Ribeiro (LinkedIn, GitHub) imagined Saul as a personal attorney against procrastination ‚Äî with tremor, siren, and courtroom-grade reports.

codeconStoryLead.message: In 30 minutes of whiteboard, Ot√°vio sketched the MVP and, over the next 4 hours, shipped the seed of Saul: an extension that proves remote work works by watching tabs, calculating an index, and drafting the dev‚Äôs defense for the ‚Äújury‚Äù (the boss) ‚Äî all without AI.

codeconTitle.message: Where Saul Goodman became a Chrome extension

codeconVideoCaption.message: Clip from the CodeCon Hack Lab where Saul came to life as a distraction-busting extension.

demoLead.message: One glance is enough: popup for instant reactions, report for end-of-day decisions.

demoPopupBody.message: Daily index, top domains, and export shortcuts at hand.

demoReportBody.message: Charts, light storytelling, and suggested next moves.

demoTitle.message: See where you decide and where Saul intervenes.

devBody.message: Hook up the local daemon and VS Code extension to count editor time as productive minutes without leaving localhost.

devLead.message: All technical details moved out of the main flow. Start with the guides below.

extDescription.message: Sarcastic focus tracker that measures domains and keeps your procrastination index in check.

extensionsCopy.message: Bring Saul to Chrome and VS Code to keep your focus honest.

faq1Answer.message: Totally. Saul only charges attention and humor.

faq2Question.message: Do my data leave the browser?

faq3Answer.message: Only if you want narratives in the report. The rest works offline.

faq4Answer.message: No. Everything runs locally with no login.

faq5Answer.message: When the index crosses your threshold the screen shakes and a siren plays for a few seconds.

faq6Answer.message: Yes. In the options screen you set productive/villain lists, weights, and schedules.

faq6Question.message: Can I customize domains and schedules?

faq7Answer.message: Yes. CSV and PDF buttons let you download the data instantly.

faq8Answer.message: Built for Chrome but compatible with Chromium-based browsers like Brave or Edge.

faq8Question.message: Does it work in other browsers?

faq9Answer.message: AI storytelling is optional; if you skip the OpenAI key everything stays offline.

feature1Item1.message: Badge with current index and sarcastic messages.

feature1Item2.message: Top productive and villain domains with formatted time.

feature2Item2.message: Critical overlay with countdown and CTA.

feature2Item3.message: Blocks only villain tabs so you can recover in productive ones.

feature3Item1.message: Charts per hour and tab-switch breakdown.

feature3Item2.message: AI narrative in Better Call Saul tone.

feature3Item3.message: Critical banner with immediate action plan.

feature4Item1.message: Data in chrome.storage.local ‚Äî nothing goes to the cloud.

feature4Item2.message: Productive/villain lists saved only in your browser.

featureBlockBody.message: If you enable the mode, Saul slams villain tabs in full-screen until you return to focus and win back points.

featureBlockHint.message: ‚ÄúFlip the switch when you want: only the productive tab stays open.‚Äù

featureContextBody.message: You can now set the day‚Äôs CONTEXT (work, leisure, study, personal) in the popup; Saul recalibrates the score, softens penalties, and keeps things fair.

featureCustomBody.message: Define productive and villain domains, hourly weights, and quake thresholds tuned to your routine.

featureGaugeHint.message: When it crosses 70%, Saul prepares the quake.

featurePrivacyBody.message: Everything runs inside chrome.storage.local; no external servers or leaked verdicts.

featurePrivacyHint.message: ‚ÄúNot even the judge sees your data.‚Äù

featureQuakeBody.message: Screen shake, siren, and Saul on top of villain tabs screaming for you to get back on track.

featureQuakeHint.message: ‚ÄúCaught you! Back to the productive tab now.‚Äù

featureRealtimeBody.message: The badge watches every tab and turns your day into a clear score of focus versus procrastination.

featureReportBody.message: Charts, AI storytelling, CSV/PDF exports, and minute-by-minute timeline for your next stand-up.

featureReportHint.message: ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs the evidence for you and your boss.‚Äù

featureSectionLead.message: Each card mixes humor and clarity so newcomers instantly understand what Saul does inside Chrome.

featureSectionTitle.message: Everything you need to keep tabs in check.

featuresTitle.message: The arsenal of the Saul Goodman extension.

featureSwipeHint.message: Swipe sideways to review every feature Saul handles.

finalCtaBody.message: Install, set your domains, and get nudged back to focus before villain tabs win the day.

finalCtaTitle.message: Ready to let Saul take over?

footerBody.message: Install, list your villains, and let Saul collect focus fees.

footerPrivacy.message: 100% local data. Not even the judge sees it.

heroGaugeHint.message: When it hits 70%, quake mode storms in.

heroSubtitle.message: It tracks your tabs, flags distractions, and nudges you back to focus before the day derails ‚Äî all inside Chrome, no sign-ups.

heroTitle.message: Stop procrastinating. Saul Goodman takes the case.

indexCalloutQuote.message: ‚ÄúCross 60% and I‚Äôm calling your boss. Drop below 10% and I‚Äôm booking your therapist. Balance the docket, client!‚Äù

indexClueAlertBody.message: Double-check threshold, siren, and copy so the summons hits at the right time.

indexClueBreakBody.message: The 15‚Äì22 range demands strategic breaths. Block them on your calendar, client.

indexClueFocusBody.message: Keep a living list of tabs that spike the index before Saul files a motion.

indexFootnote.message: Between 15 and 22 Saul files ‚Äústeady client.‚Äù Above that he arms the quake; below that he prescribes rest, not extra tasks.

indexGaugeHint.message: 18% hits the sweet spot ‚Äî steady focus without going full robot.

indexLead.message: Legal translation service: a score of 0 isn‚Äôt a trophy and 100 isn‚Äôt an all-inclusive. Saul reads each band to decide whether to shake your chair or force a vacation day.

indexMemoBody.message: If a villain tab spikes the index, trigger full-screen block mode. Saul locks villains out, frees only the productive tab, and your score breathes again.

indexPitch1.message: The index ranges from 0 to 100. The closer to 100, the clearer you dropped the case mid-trial and became a VIP client of procrastination.

indexPitch2.message: But hitting zero looks suspicious too: anyone glued to productive tabs 24/7 is one step from a burnout deposition.

indexRange0to14Body.message: You‚Äôre so glued to work that Saul calls it ‚Äúexcessive zeal.‚Äù Breathe, stand up, and grab water before this becomes testimony.

indexRange15to22Body.message: Ideal verdict: consistent focus, healthy breaks, zero sirens. Saul might even consider a fee discount.

indexRange23to60Body.message: You‚Äôre still pleading the case but stumble into villain feeds. Saul fires witty notices to haul the trial back on track.

indexRange61to100Body.message: It‚Äôs quake o‚Äôclock. The screen shakes, the siren blares, and Saul walks in with a cease-and-desist for every villain tab.

indexTitle.message: How Saul reads the Procrastination Index

integrationCard1Body.message: Generate the pairing key, toggle the integration, and set the local URL. Nothing leaves your browser.

integrationCard2Body.message: Use the VS Code extension command to start it: it pre-fills PAIRING_KEY/PORT and opens in the daemon folder.

integrationCard3Body.message: Command ‚ÄúSaul Goodman: preparar comando do SaulDaemon‚Äù ships ready after install and sends editor heartbeats to Chrome.

integrationLead.message: Turn on the optional integration: Saul adds editor time as productive without leaving localhost.

integrationTitle.message: VS Code + local daemon, all counted as productive.

manifesto1Body.message: Your day is judged inside the browser. No data leaves the computer, not even by court order.

manifesto2Body.message: Visual and sound alerts make it clear when Saul is about to charge extra fees.

manifesto3Body.message: Sarcastic messages and dramatic banners remind you procrastination is also expensive.

manifestoTitle.message: Aggressive marketing with a pinch of ethics.

newsletterCopy.message: Short bursts of sarcasm and discipline so your VS Code stops acting like Netflix.

newsletterDisclaimer.message: No spam. Only the sarcasm you can handle.

newsletterSuccess.message: You're on the radar. New drops coming soon.

notification_update_message.message: The extension has been updated. Click to view the changelog.

options_auto_classification_ai_hint.message: Reserved for future AI; stays off.

options_auto_classification_cooldown_hin.message: Respects the interval before reminding about the same domain. Default: 24h.

options_auto_classification_hint.message: Runs locally. We only read title, meta description/keywords, og:type and video/scroll signals to suggest a label.

options_auto_classification_toggle_hint.message: Optional: suggests a label when a domain is not on your list.

options_confirm_reset.message: This will restore the default values. Continue?

options_critical_sound_hint.message: When enabled, the siren plays whenever the critical alert fires.

options_critical_threshold_hint.message: When the index hits this value, Saul triggers the critical alert.

options_domain_filter_hint.message: Type part of a domain to filter the lists below.

options_footer_note.message: Saul doesn't share your data with anyone. Not even the judge.

options_holiday_context_hint.message: Use the popup to choose the day's CONTEXT (work, leisure, study, day off, vacation, or personal). Saul records the history and adjusts the score fairly.

options_holiday_country_error.message: Use two letters only, e.g., BR or US.

options_holiday_country_hint.message: BR, US, PT. Saul never tries to detect your country automatically.

options_holiday_hint.message: When enabled, Saul calls only Nager.Date to see if today is a national holiday and neutralizes the score.

options_holiday_toggle_hint.message: Calls happen only if you enable and set the country. No automatic location.

options_inactivity_threshold.message: Maximum idle time before counting as inactive (seconds)

options_inactivity_threshold_hint.message: Between 10s and 10min; impacts the inactivity calculation.

options_language_hint.message: Pick manually or let the language follow Chrome.

options_openai_hint.message: Stored locally to generate narratives in the report.

options_procrastination_block_toggle_hin.message: When enabled, Saul blocks navigation to these sites using local Chrome rules.

options_procrastination_hint.message: Here live the temptations. If you love a site, it probably belongs here.

options_productive_hint.message: Saul knows where work happens. Add or remove based on your routine.

options_promise.message: Saul keeps your data under seal while negotiating with your focus.

options_schedule_hint.message: Tell Saul when your official shift happens. Outside these blocks, productive minutes count double.

options_subtitle.message: Customize the radar to match your procrastination style. Everything stays local.

options_vscode_install_hint.message: Install the official VS Code extension to send focus sessions.

options_vscode_key_hint.message: Must match the key configured in SaulDaemon/VS Code.

options_vscode_test_disabled.message: Enable VS Code integration before testing.

options_vscode_test_invalid_url.message: Invalid URL. Use something like http://127.0.0.1:3123.

options_vscode_test_timeout.message: SaulDaemon did not respond in time.

options_vscode_test_unauthorized.message: Different key. Use the same key in Chrome and VS Code.

options_vscode_toggle_hint.message: Calls the local SaulDaemon (localhost) before refreshing your score.

options_vscode_toggle_label.message: Insert focus time from VS Code

options_vscode_url_hint.message: Only talks to localhost; nothing leaves your machine.

options_weight_hint.message: Use numbers between 0 and 1 to calibrate the influence on the index.

options_weights_sum_error.message: The sum of weights must be 1.

popup_alert_no_data.message: No data yet. Open some tabs and try again.

popup_blog_error.message: Couldn't reach the blog right now.

popup_blog_reason_dev.message: Time to boost dev performance with zero cheap coaching.

popup_blog_reason_procrastinacao.message: Because your procrastination crossed the legal limit today.

popup_blog_reason_remoto.message: Survive remote work without going full ghost mode.

popup_blog_section_subtitle.message: We read your numbers and point to a Saul-style article.

popup_critical_countdown_final.message: No excuses: close three procrastination tabs now!

popup_critical_default_message.message: At this index not even I can defend you. This will cost risk fees!

popup_critical_message_1.message: Client, with index {threshold} not even I can defend you. Risk fees apply!

popup_critical_message_2.message: That tremor? The judge slamming your productivity.

popup_critical_message_3.message: Stop procrastinating or I'll buy primetime ads telling your story.

popup_critical_message_4.message: Help me defend you: close those tabs before I start billing in dollars.

popup_error_runtime.message: Oops! Unable to reach the office.

popup_export_description.message: Turn your numbers into Saul Goodman‚Äìstyle arguments.

popup_fairness_holiday_active.message: Today is a holiday, score paused automatically.

popup_fairness_note.message: Saul recalibrates the score based on the context you choose in the popup. Skipping today zeros the score and mutes alerts. Contexts: Work keeps 100%, Personal neutralizes everything, Leisure counts 30% of focus and ignores villains, Study halves penalties, Day off and Vacation zero the day regardless of holidays.

popup_kpi_focus_domain_tooltip.message: Productive domain where you invested more continuous time today.

popup_kpi_focus_tooltip.message: Percentage of productive time over everything tracked today.

popup_kpi_idle_tooltip.message: Percentage of the day the browser stayed open without interaction.

popup_kpi_ratio_tooltip.message: Productive hours offsetting each procrastination hour.

popup_kpi_section_subtitle.message: Straight to the point: raw numbers from your day.

popup_kpi_switch_tooltip.message: Average tab switches per monitored hour.

popup_kpi_villain_tooltip.message: Procrastination domain that stole most of your time.

popup_privacy_note.message: All data stays in your browser. Saul honors attorney‚Äìclient privilege.

popup_release_notes_error.message: Couldn't open the release notes. Reload the extension and try again.

popup_score_message_alert.message: You're playing with fire. I bill by the hour to put fires out.

popup_score_message_excellent.message: Golden client! Keep it up and I can charge full retainer.

popup_score_message_ok.message: Still counts as office hours. Don't make me call your focus.

popup_score_message_warning.message: I see avoidance here. Time to get back in the game.

popup_summary_idle_tooltip.message: Time the browser stayed open without activity.

popup_summary_inactive_tooltip.message: Periods when the browser stayed open without interaction.

popup_summary_productive_tooltip.message: Time spent on domains marked as productive.

privacySubheading.message: Here is the latest version of the policy published in the repository.

process1Body.message: The badge sits quietly watching what‚Äôs open and knows instantly if you‚Äôre studying, working, or doom-scrolling.

process2Body.message: You define productive vs. villain domains. If you wander off, Saul shakes the screen and shouts before the spiral begins.

process3Body.message: Every day ends with a clean report: charts, highlights, and an action plan for tomorrow.

processLead.message: No legal jargon: install it, let it watch your tabs, feel the alerts, and end your day with ready-to-share evidence.

processTitle.message: Saul locks procrastination in three steps.

quakeBody.message: The overlay blocks villain tabs, shows a bold CTA, and can blast the optional siren. Impossible to ignore ‚Äî exactly as planned.

quakeDemoBody.message: Click to simulate earthquake mode: screen shake, siren, and a dramatic message. Same as the extension, but only for a few seconds here.

quakeDisplayCopy.message: Jump back to focus or Saul raises his fees.

quakeLead.message: The same dramatic alert from the extension shows up here so visitors feel how serious the warning is past the threshold.

quakeOverlayBody.message: Saul is shaking villain tabs. Get back to focus before he charges extra.

quakeTip.message: Relax: the preview lasts just a few seconds.

quakeTitle.message: When Saul spots villains, the page shakes with him.

ratingBadgeAlt.message: Average rating on Chrome Web Store

reactionBlockHint.message: Redirects to the block page with Saul shutting the door.

reactionBlockText.message: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt even try it: villains get blocked instantly.‚Äù

reactionDisbeliefHint.message: Triggers when the quake threshold is crossed.

reactionHypeHint.message: Shows up when you jump back to productive tabs.

reactionsBody.message: When the index spikes, Saul is incredulous. When you return to focus, he celebrates. Quick visuals to keep the bar of justice in place.

reason1Body.message: The popup index shows your current status so you know what to fix next.

reason2Body.message: The quake takes over the screen before a villain tab ruins your momentum.

reason3Body.message: Charts and summaries drop perfectly into a daily, stand-up, or client update.

reason4Body.message: Every metric lives inside Chrome; nothing leaves your machine.

reasonsLead.message: Four quick cards explain the value with zero fluff.

report_ai_error_generic.message: Saul could not convince the digital judge. Try again later.

report_ai_hint.message: Click "Generate narrative" so Saul can analyze your day with his sarcasm.

report_ai_missing_key.message: Configure your OpenAI key in the options before generating the narrative.

report_ai_no_metrics.message: No metrics to tell a story today.

report_ai_subtitle.message: A dramatic defense based on your data.

report_banner_countdown_final.message: Time to act: close the villain tabs and come back in control.

report_banner_message_1.message: Not even I can persuade the jury with index {threshold}. Cut the distractions!

report_banner_message_2.message: Keep this up and I'll rent a billboard warning your boss.

report_banner_message_3.message: This quake is the echo of your villain tabs. Close them now.

report_banner_message_4.message: The tab bill is growing: focus now or we charge extra fees.

report_banner_message_default.message: This index is skyrocketing. I will need risk bonuses!

report_composition_heading_tooltip.message: Breakdown into productive, procrastination, idle, and neutral.

report_context_breakdown_index_tooltip.message: Closer to 100% smells like procrastination; closer to 0% means you worked‚Äîand I can defend you.

report_context_effect_dayOff.message: Zeros the day‚Äîno credit, no debt. Official day off.

report_context_effect_leisure.message: Only 30% focus counted and villains ignored. Most flexible context.

report_context_effect_personal.message: Neutralizes everything: no credit, no debt. Saul takes the day for personal matters.

report_context_effect_study.message: Focus counts 75% and penalties drop by half. Flexible but still disciplined.

report_context_effect_vacation.message: Neutralizes index and villains: day stays 0/0. Treats declared vacations.

report_domain_subtitle.message: Main champions and villains aggregated for the day.

report_fairness_holiday_active.message: Today is a holiday, score paused automatically.

report_fairness_tooltip.message: Manual override, context, or holidays can neutralize the score. We log it whenever it happens.

report_hero_message_alert.message: Verdict is clear: procrastination on trial. We need an urgent plan.

report_hero_message_excellent.message: Impeccable schedule. Saul could use you in a TV ad.

report_hero_message_ok.message: Acceptable swings. We can still tell the jury you worked.

report_hero_message_warning.message: Visible relapses today. Time to call reinforcements.

report_hero_placeholder.message: Saul is still collecting evidence about your day.

report_hourly_empty.message: Not enough minutes yet to build this flow.

report_hourly_heading_tooltip.message: Productive, procrastination, and idle minutes per hour.

report_hourly_subtitle.message: Productivity versus temptations through the day.

report_kpi_audio_hint.message: Minutes with audio on villain sites

report_kpi_audio_tooltip.message: Time with audio playing on procrastination domains.

report_kpi_heading_tooltip.message: Extra KPIs: villain media, real idle time, SPA routes, grouped tabs.

report_kpi_restored_tooltip.message: Number of tabs or windows closed today.

report_kpi_spa_tooltip.message: Internal route changes in single-page apps.

report_kpi_subtitle.message: Real idle, SPA routes, and media time.

report_logo_alt_critical.message: Saul Goodman shocked by your focus

report_ranking_procrastination_tooltip.message: Ranking of procrastination domains by time.

report_ranking_productive_tooltip.message: Ranking of productive domains by time.

report_share_copy_instagram.message: Text copied. Open Instagram and paste before posting.

report_share_copy_linkedin.message: Text copied. Paste it into LinkedIn before posting.

report_share_copy_success.message: Post copied. Paste on LinkedIn, Twitter, anywhere.

report_share_cta.message: Brought to you by Saul Goodman.

report_share_hint_instagram.message: Instagram Web can't prefill text: paste what we copied into the posting box.

report_share_hint_linkedin.message: LinkedIn won't prefill text; paste the copied content on the site.

report_share_opening.message: My client worked hard and I have evidence.

report_share_social_tagline.message: Objection! My client put in the work.

report_share_success.message: Share sheet opened! If it doesn't appear, we copied it to your clipboard.

report_story_idle_body.message: Between {range} the browser stayed idle for {duration}. Total idle time today: {total}.

report_story_short_day.message: The day was too short to tell a story.

report_tab_switch_empty.message: Not enough switches yet to plot this chart.

report_tab_switch_subtitle.message: How you jumped between productive, procrastination, and neutral.

report_timeline_heading_tooltip.message: Key slices grouped by hour and category.

report_timeline_subtitle.message: Highlights that tell the story of your shift.

seoDescription.message: Saul Goodman polices your tabs, fights procrastination, and delivers dramatic reports in your browser. Everything stays local, no external servers.

socialProofCaption.message: Saul already helps thousands keep their focus.

splitPopupBody.message: The panel shows the index, top domains, extra indicators, and lets you export CSV/PDF. When focus drops, earthquake mode storms in to save the bar of justice.

splitPopupCaption.message: Popup with index, top domains, and exports.

splitPopupCaption2.message: KPIs, top domains, and quick export.

splitPopupCaption3.message: Productive/villain lists in the options panel.

splitPopupCaption4.message: Configurable weights and schedules for the index.

splitReportBody.message: Charts per hour, villain ranking, AI narrative, and critical banner with action plan. All with sworn visuals.

splitReportCaption.message: Report summary with charts and ranking.

stickyCtaText.message: Saul is ready to watch your tabs.

testimonial1Quote.message: ‚ÄúSaul reminded me that switching 40 tabs per hour is a crime.‚Äù

testimonial2Quote.message: ‚ÄúThe report became a defense piece in the meeting with my boss.‚Äù

testimonial3Quote.message: ‚ÄúEarthquake mode saved my sprint. Fees gladly paid.‚Äù

timeline1Body.message: Content script detects activity on first tabs. Saul logs who is productive or a villain.

timeline2Body.message: If the index climbs too high, earthquake mode storms Chrome with quake, siren, and CTA to turn the game.

timeline3Body.message: Detailed report ships charts, timeline, and AI narrative to close the day with evidence.

transparencyBody.message: Read how we handle your data and every release note with zero fluff.

trustCard1Body.message: Metrics live in chrome.storage.local. Nothing touches external servers.

trustCard2Body.message: Every line is public so the community can audit changes.

trustCard3Body.message: You pick the threshold and can silence Saul whenever you need.

trustLead.message: Playful tone, serious security: here‚Äôs how data and alerts really work.

trustTitle.message: Everything stays between you and your browser.

vscodeCard1Body.message: The local daemon talks to the extension and logs editor time as productive minutes. Nothing leaves localhost, but the stopwatch never sleeps.

vscodeCard1Title.message: Every commit counts as billable time.

vscodeCard2Body.message: Jumped from editor to the feed? Saul stamps the distraction in the report. Back to code? He records it as proof of innocence.

vscodeCard2Title.message: VS Code and Chrome swap clues.

vscodeCard3Body.message: Reports bring coding time, interruptions, and usual suspects. Perfect to show your manager procrastination never stood a chance.

vscodeCard3Title.message: Export the defense with metrics and receipts.

vscodeLead.message: Saul plugs VS Code into the case: editor minutes become focus evidence, distractions become suspects, and the report arrives ready to convince the jury (your team).

vscodeProofBody.message: A timeline that proves who stayed in code and who ran to the feed. Bring it as Exhibit A to your next meeting.

vscodeProofLine1.message: 09:12 ‚Äî VS Code active ¬∑ 38 min without tab hopping.

vscodeProofLine2.message: 09:50 ‚Äî Jumped to YouTube ¬∑ Saul flagged it as distraction.

vscodeProofLine3.message: 10:05 ‚Äî Back to VS Code ¬∑ 21 min of focus recovered.

vscodeTitle.message: Turn your editor into a productivity asset.
